TEXT.TITLE: UNITED CABLE TELEVISION CORP <UCT> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 24 cts vs profit seven cts Net loss 5,952,000 vs profit 2,078,000 Revs 55.9 mln vs 50.6 mln Avg shrs 25.2 mln vs 24.7 mln Nine mths Shr loss 11 cts vs profit 24 cts Net loss 2,673,000 vs profit 6,800,000 Revs 162.6 mln vs 143.9 mln Avg shrs 25.0 mln vs 24.4 mln NOTE: Current year net both periods includes pretax charge seven mln dlrs from increase in reserve for investments in broadcast television entities and tax credits of 1,002,000 dlrs in quarter and 520,000 dlrs in nine mths.
